channel.title: SilverCraft SC {Shops} {Ranks} {Survival} {MobArena} {War} {24/7}
channel.description:
SilverCraft SC is a Bukkit Survival Server with many fun Plugins. Like survival come survive but, if you just like killing people you can pvp at the warhub with /warhub. If you wana slay mobs with powerful weapons try the MobArena. There is so much to do that everyone should try out my Server, their are friendly admins and amazing plugins that will sure make this a great server for you to play in! I hope to see you there! :D
IP: 100.42.217.2:25579
